channel.title: Changing background image of log in screen
channel.description: Hey could anyone tell me how to change the background picture , remove the fire annimation and the runescape logo from client and how to rename the client at the top of the window?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 21, 2009, 04:33:55 pm[/size][hr]worked it out so no need to help me :)

item.title: Changing background image of log in screen
item.dc:creator: @Umah Umah
item.description:
@Umah wrote:

I searched the tutorial on removing the flames and the rslogo, here it is, not made by me.

Go into you’re Client Folder and go into Client.java and search Logo.

You will see:

class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1(aClass44_1053, "logo", 0);

Change the 0 on the end to a 1 Save and Compile try it out.

Now for the Flames, Go into Client.Java in Client Folder, Search for Method58

Looks like this:

[code] public final void method58(int i)
{
char c = ‘\u0100’;
for(int j = 10; j < 117; j++)
{
int k = (int)(Math.random() * 100D);
if(k < 50)
anIntArray828[j + (c - 2 << 7)] = 255;
}

    if(i != 25106)
        method6();
    for(int l = 0; l < 100; l++)
    {
        int i1 = (int)(Math.random() * 124D) + 2;
        int k1 = (int)(Math.random() * 128D) + 128;
        int k2 = i1 + (k1 << 7);
        anIntArray828[k2] = 192;
    }

    for(int j1 = 1; j1 < c - 1; j1++)
    {
        for(int l1 = 1; l1 < 127; l1++)
        {
            int l2 = l1 + (j1 << 7);
            anIntArray829[l2] = (anIntArray828[l2 - 1] + anIntArray828[l2 + 1] + anIntArray828[l2 - 128] + anIntArray828[l2 + 128]) / 4;
        }

    }

    anInt1275 += 128;
    if(anInt1275 > anIntArray1190.length)
    {
        anInt1275 -= anIntArray1190.length;
        int i2 = (int)(Math.random() * 12D);
        method106(aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub2Array1152[i2], -135);
    }
    for(int j2 = 1; j2 < c - 1; j2++)
    {
        for(int i3 = 1; i3 < 127; i3++)
        {
            int k3 = i3 + (j2 << 7);
            int i4 = anIntArray829[k3 + 128] - anIntArray1190[k3 + anInt1275 & anIntArray1190.length - 1] / 5;
            if(i4 < 0)
                i4 = 0;
            anIntArray828[k3] = i4;
        }

    }

    for(int j3 = 0; j3 < c - 1; j3++)
        anIntArray969[j3] = anIntArray969[j3 + 1];

    anIntArray969[c - 1] = (int)(Math.sin((double)anInt1161 / 14D) * 16D + Math.sin((double)anInt1161 / 15D) * 14D + Math.sin((double)anInt1161 / 16D) * 12D);
    if(anInt1040 > 0)
        anInt1040 -= 4;
    if(anInt1041 > 0)
        anInt1041 -= 4;
    if(anInt1040 == 0 && anInt1041 == 0)
    {
        int l3 = (int)(Math.random() * 2000D);
        if(l3 == 0)
            anInt1040 = 1024;
        if(l3 == 1)
            anInt1041 = 1024;
    }
}[/code]

Delete everything and make it look like this.

public final void method58(int i) { }

To change the background, simply find the picture, right click, open with paint, and just edit it and then save it when your done.
